ComicInfo.Summary:
It's the finale of "The Black Forest", and with it comes earth-shattering ramifications for the world of Fables.
Tink has become something far more powerful than anyone could've imagined, but will she be defeated and things reach their happily ever after?
ComicInfo.Title: The Black Forest Chapter Twelve: Rightful Prey
ComicInfo.Characters: Bellerophon,Herne,Peter Pan,Pinocchio,Connor Wolf,Snow White,Mrs. Bear,Ambrose Wolf,Blossom Wolf,Iago Warduck,Greenjack,Sam,Tinker Bell,Lake,Therese Wolf,Cinderella,Kaimera,Winter Wolf,Mr. Wellstuffed,Bigby Wolf
